questions.question_text_1: THIS IS QUESTION PAPER FOR THE SUBJECT "DIPLOMA LEVEL : MODERN APPLICATION DEVELOPMENT II (COMPUTER BASED EXAM)" ARE YOU SURE YOU HAVE TO WRITE EXAM FOR THIS SUBJECT? questions.question_text_1: Which of the following statement(s) is/are true regarding Single Page Applications (SPA) and Progressive Web Apps (PWA)?
question_texts: Which of the following statement(s) is/are true regarding Single Page Applications (SPA) and Progressive Web Apps (PWA)?

options.option_text: SPAs use client-side routing to dynamically update content without full pagereloads.
PWAs can work offline using service workers.
SPAs always require a server-side language to handle routing.
PWAs can be added to a device’s home screen like native apps.

questions.question_text_1: Suppose the button is clicked multiple times quickly, the message area flickers unexpectedly. How can you improve the code to ensure proper async behavior and prevent overlapping fetches?
